name: Java Electronic Scoreboard Connector
short_description: The purpose of the "Java Electronic Scoreboard Connector" is to provide an adapter for scoreboards of various manufacturers (like Omega Timing, Molten, Stramatel, Waterfly, Daktronics, ...) that enable Java applications to trigger these scoreboards.
